name: SinnerSchrader
description:
SinnerSchrader is one of Europe’s leading digital agencies. With a focus on e-commerce, strategy and communication, SinnerSchrader offers the full range of digital agency services: conception, design, development and hosting of web platforms, mobile apps, service design, campaigns, media, analytics and audience management.
SinnerSchrader was founded in 1996, went public in 1999 and has offices in Hamburg, Berlin, Frankfurt am Main, Munich, Prague and Hanover.
